channel.title: Regrettable Moments in Gaming
channel.description: Recent content on Regrettable Moments in Gaming

item.title: Troll Housewarming Party
item.description: Hello, THAT Conference! You are all wonderful! What happens when you accidentally invite a Troll to your house? A regrettable moment in gaming. This originally appeared on Twitch, courtesy of TanookiZoot (myself).

item.title: About
item.description: This is a relatively silly site meant to embrace the regrettable moments that happen in games. Without anguish, the joy wouldn’t feel quite as good. This site is built in Hugo. The theme is the wonderful hugo-8bits-theme, made by Miguel Simoni, coming fromthe work done by nes-css. The source code for this site is is available here. Shoutout to the BeanPod group, created by HopSmith: TinhatBobcat Zitronay sp00kywii bznzgoth Katiejho ….

item.title: Contact us
item.description: Send me a message by completing the information below and pressing the Send button.
